item.description:
We had such a great response to this venue that we are coming back!

Come and join us for our Second afterwork at Salvatore's restaurant in the Seaport Area. It is at the new, exciting Liberty Wharf on the Waterfront. The restaurant is an adorable and cozy place right across the street from the old Jimmy's Harborside just past the Boston Fish Pier. We will have our own room and bar on street level. You can view the water from afar (across the street). If the weather is decent, they will open up the doors and tables will be set outside.

Light appetizers will be served compliments of Sitzundjibers.

Looking forward to seeing you there!!

 

Directions  

Salvatore's is located on 225 Northern Ave. across from the old Jimmy's Harborside in the Seaport area.

 

There is on street parking. There is a parking lot directly behind the restaurant on Park Lane Drive called Pilgrim's parking. The tickets will be validated for 1/2 price for up to 2 1/2 hours.
item.name: An "Afterwork" in the new, bustling Seaport district
